trans-unit.source: To configure your VPN device, you'll need the public IP address of the virtual network gateway for configuring your on-premises VPN device.
trans-unit.target: To configure your VPN device, you'll need the public IP address of the virtual network gateway for configuring your on-premises VPN device.

trans-unit.source: Work with your device manufacturer for specific configuration information and configure your device.
trans-unit.target: Work with your device manufacturer for specific configuration information and configure your device.

trans-unit.source: Refer to the [VPN Devices](../articles/vpn-gateway/vpn-gateway-about-vpn-devices.md) for more information about VPN devices that work well with Azure.
trans-unit.target: Refer to the [VPN Devices](../articles/vpn-gateway/vpn-gateway-about-vpn-devices.md) for more information about VPN devices that work well with Azure.

trans-unit.source: To find the public IP address of your virtual network gateway using PowerShell, use the following sample:
trans-unit.target: To find the public IP address of your virtual network gateway using PowerShell, use the following sample:

trans-unit.source: You can also view the public IP address for your virtual network gateway by using the Azure portal.
trans-unit.target: You can also view the public IP address for your virtual network gateway by using the Azure portal.

trans-unit.source: Navigate to **Virtual network gateways**, then click the name of your gateway.
trans-unit.target: Navigate to **Virtual network gateways**, then click the name of your gateway.
